did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Photographs of West Main Street Bridge, Charlottesville 1995
did.physdesc: There are 15 photographs, positive, b&w; 10 x 12.5 cm; and 15 photographs, negative.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: West Main Street bridge photographs, 1995, Charlottesville, Accession # 11168, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the University of Virginia Library by Susan E. Smead, Architectural Historian, Department of Transportation, Commonwealth of Virginia, on April 26, 1995, as part of the Historic America Engineering Project.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of thirty photographs, positive and negative, of the West Main Street bridge in Charlottesville, Virginia, 1995, which spans the Southern Railway at the Charlottesville Union Station.
